name: giveaway
description: Advanced giveaway management with multiple entry modes (reaction, button, trivia)
author: kriz_cold

configSchema.name: Giveaway System Config
configSchema.description: Configuration for the giveaway management system

itemsPerPage.description: Number of giveaways to display per page in list view (max 8)

nameDisplayCap.description: Maximum character length for giveaway names in list view (longer names are truncated)

colors.createPanel.description: Hex color code for create giveaway panel embeds (Discord Blurple)

colors.listPanel.description: Hex color code for list giveaways panel embeds (Teal)

colors.mainPanel.description: Hex color code for main giveaway panel embeds (Discord Blurple)

colors.detailPanelActive.description: Hex color code for active giveaway detail panel embeds (Green)

colors.detailPanelEnded.description: Hex color code for ended giveaway detail panel embeds (Orange)

colors.detailPanelCancelled.description: Hex color code for cancelled giveaway detail panel embeds (Red/Pink)

colors.activeGiveaway.description: Hex color code for active giveaway announcement embeds (Green)

labels.enterButton.description: Button label for entering button-mode giveaways

labels.triviaButton.description: Button label for answering trivia-mode giveaways

files.name: Giveaway Data
files.description: Stores active and past giveaways including participants, winners, and settings

files.name: User Participation Data
files.description: Tracks user participation history and cooldowns for giveaways
